= How to =
_A step by step walkthrough_

==Managing the Inventory==
===How to add by name===
  # Navigate to the main menu of the application.
  # Select "Add Item."
[http://hybris.googlecode.com/svn/Images/AddItem.png]
  # Select By Name.
  # Search for the item.
  # Select the item.
[http://hybris.googlecode.com/svn/Images/CanolaOil.png]
  # Specify the quantity and unit.
[http://hybris.googlecode.com/svn/Images/16floz.png]
===How to add by bar code===
  # Navigate to the main menu of the application.
  # Select Add Item.
[http://hybris.googlecode.com/svn/Images/AddItem.png]
  # Select "With Bar Code Scanner."
  # Scan the item.
===How to remove===
  # Navigate to the main menu of the application.
  # Select "View Inventory."
[http://hybris.googlecode.com/svn/Images/ViewInventory.png]
  # Select the item to remove.
[http://hybris.googlecode.com/svn/Images/CanolaInventory.png]
  # Enter the amount to remove and select "OK"
[http://hybris.googlecode.com/svn/Images/Remove.png]

==Look-up Recipes==
===How to find a random recipe===
  # Navigate to the main menu of the application.
  # Select "Random Recipe."
[http://hybris.googlecode.com/svn/Images/LookUp.png]
===How to browse all recipes===
  # Navigate to the main menu of the application.
  # Select "Look Up Recipe."
[http://hybris.googlecode.com/svn/Images/LookUp.png]
  # Choose All. 
[http://hybris.googlecode.com/svn/Images/LookupAll.png]
  # Scroll through recipes or type in the name of the recipe.
[http://hybris.googlecode.com/svn/Images/PickMuffins.png]
===How to browse through recipes that can be made using the inventory===
  # Navigate to the main menu of the application.
  # Select "Look Up Recipe."
[http://hybris.googlecode.com/svn/Images/LookUp.png]
  # Choose "Using Inventory"
[http://hybris.googlecode.com/svn/Images/LookUpInventory.png]
  # Scroll through the recipes if any are available
[http://hybris.googlecode.com/svn/Images/Pickbrownies.png]
